meanings.definition: The act of not renewing something.
meanings.sent1: The nonrenewals of library books can lead to late fees.
meanings.sent2: The nonrenewals of memberships often require reapplication.
meanings.sent3: The nonrenewals of gym passes left many without access to the treadmills.
meanings.sent4: Her nonrenewals of promises made her unreliable in the eyes of her friends.
meanings.sent5: The nonrenewals of contracts caused chaos in the office.

meanings.definition: The state of being not renewed.
meanings.sent1: The company faced financial challenges due to nonrenewals of contracts.
meanings.sent2: The nonrenewals of leases left the apartments vacant.
meanings.sent3: The nonrenewals of subscriptions left her mailbox empty.
meanings.sent4: His nonrenewals of friendships made him feel isolated.
meanings.sent5: The nonrenewals of warranties left many products unprotected.
